riskgame.model.BasicClass

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • riskgame.model.BasicClass.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes attributes a continent need and required methods. Countries inside a continent object is stored in graph with LinkedHashMap.
    Since:
    build1
    Author:
    WW
